item.title: Extended-Release Buprenorphine Aids Perinatal Recovery
item.description: Extended-release buprenorphine ends use of nonprescribed opioids and is safe for mother and baby. Medscape Medical News

item.title: New Guidelines Urge Scoring System to Diagnose Strep Throat
item.description: The recommendations aim to reduce unnecessary ‘cumbersome’ testing and improve antibiotic stewardship in sore throat management. Medscape Medical News
